content: I'll definitely check out those organizations and suggestions. I'm also curious about cultural events that might be happening at my workplace. As part of the diversity and inclusion committee, we've been organizing cultural events and workshops to promote greater understanding and appreciation of the different demographic groups within our organization. I think it would be great to have more events that focus on Muslim culture and heritage, especially after the successful panel discussion on the experiences of Muslim women in the workplace. Do you know of any resources or ideas that I could share with my committee to help us plan more inclusive and culturally sensitive events?
